metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8790 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
The EbmlUnicodeString::UpdateFromUTF8 function in libEBML before 1.3.3allows context-dependent attackers to obtain sensitive information fromprocess heap memory via a crafted UTF-8 string, which triggers an invalidmemory access.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8790` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libebml4v5 - 1.3.3-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libebml package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.3-1').
